TopicTitle: Is there any mod that turns your entire vessel into a single rigid body?

Articles.Content: For filmmaking reasons I made a super long interplanetary vessel (nearly half the length of KSC runway) and now the ship will fold in on itself even when the RCSs fire...... autostrut won't help as I already strut every single part. Is there a mod that makes the game physics just treat the entire ship as one part?

Kerbal joint reinforcement will do the trick if you want stronger joints.

For treating it as one part, use UbioWelding!

On 7/5/2022 at 10:24 PM, KerbalMurderer said:

Is there a mod that makes the game physics just treat the entire ship as one part?

Not when in flight. UbioWelding is definitly the way to go. Even if you are just welding the trusses.

Either that or use a MM patch to extend a truss bit but the part will look quite stretched.
